/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/host.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/host.dir/gpu-mc.cpp.o CMakeFiles/host.dir/rawUtilities.cpp.o  -o host -rdynamic OpenCLUtilities/libOCL-Utilities.a -lGLEW -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libOpenCL.so -lGL -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64
